author: vmassol
msg: Ideally we should use Ajdoc. However, the generated output is not as nice as the javadoc output. In addition, ajdoc does not currently work with the JDK 1.4 (at least until Ajdoc 1.0.6).

author: vmassol
msg: Fix javadoc issue: sentences must not contain dots ("."). JDK 1.4 javadoc has a nice -breakiterator to handle this. However, it won't work in 1.2 or 1.3.

msg: Added index for the Eclipse plugin documentation
